title: Registration
description: A registration of the use of an algorithmic application by a government organization

schema.name: Schema
schema.description: The schema used for this entry.

contact_person_email.name: Contact person e-mail
contact_person_email.description: The e-mail of the contact person for this entry.

lang.name: Language
lang.description: The language in which this entry was filled.

revision_date.name: Revision date
revision_date.description: The date before which this entry has to be revisited.

name.name: Name
name.description: The colloquial name used to identify the algorithm.

organization.name: Organization
organization.description: The organization that is using the algorithm.

department.name: Department
department.description: The department that is using the algorithm.

description_short.name: Short description
description_short.description: General, short description of the algorithm, max 150 chars.

website.name: URL of the website
website.description: The URL reference to the landing page of the algorithm.

decision_making_process.name: Decision-making process
decision_making_process.description: In which decision-making process in the organization is the algorithm envolved. Are there automated decisions being made? If possible references to concrete decisions or policy, as published in publicly available sources such as council information management systems.

goal.name: Goal
goal.description: Description of the goal for which the algorithm was developed. When does it work well (in which application). And what isn't it intended for?

functions.name: Functions
functions.description: List of the most important functions of the algorithm.

impact.name: Impact
impact.description: Describe the effect that (the outcome of) the algorithm has on the day to day lives of the citizens involved. When is a citizen confronted with the algorithm. In which way is this being communicated. Please reference publicly available sources such as government decisions.

risks.name: Risks
risks.description: What are the risks of the algorithmic application? Please give specifics about how 'bias' plays a role in the use of the algorithm.

data_controller.name: Data controller
data_controller.description: Who is the data controller, and in case of personal data being used, what is the lawful basis.

objection_procedure.name: Objection procedure
objection_procedure.description: In what way can citizens object against the outcome of the algorithm.

source_data.name: Source data
source_data.description: Give an overview of the data that is being processed by the algorithm and possible dependensies that result from this.

personal_data.name: Personal data
personal_data.description: Is any personal data being used?

personal_data_description.name: Description of the personal data
personal_data_description.description: What personal data is being used. How is discrimination prevented when (proxies of) data such as ethnicity, sex or zipcode are being used. Indicate if there is any profiling based on this type of information.

description.name: Long description
description.description: Extensive description between 500 and 10000 chars in which the inner workings of the algorithms are explained.

methods_and_models.name: Methods and Models
methods_and_models.description: Indicate which standard methods or models the algorithm is using. Like ROC-curve or confusion matrix.

application_url.name: Application URL
application_url.description: The URL reference to the algorithmic application or code base.

application_version.name: Application live version
application_version.description: The version of the algorithmic application currently in use.

performance_standards.name: Perfomance standards
performance_standards.description: Which criteria are agreed upon to measure the performance of the algorithm. How is this being monitored?

risk_monitoring.name: Risk monitoring
risk_monitoring.description: How does the organisation monitor the risks.

human_intervention_description.name: Description of human intervention
human_intervention_description.description: Describe how the outcomes of the algorithm and the resulting processes can be stopt. Specify the internal and external resonsibilities, so it's clear who can and may act.
